item.title: Does Bear Cause Acne
item.description: #internetContent #health Article link: https://www.acneaction.ca/can-beer-cause-acne/ https://www.healthline.com/health/beauty-skin-care/does-alcohol-cause-acne#immune-system-and-bacteria While there is no direct link between drinking alcohol and developing acne, excess alcohol intake may aggravate acne in adults.
